div.l: ¶ For sikerly whanne I was born an non
Deeht drowe thee tappe of lyif and leete it gon
And evere syhtthe hath thee tappe so rvnne
Tille almost that all Empty is the tvnne
The streem of lyif now droppyht on the chyimbe
Thee sely tvngge may well Ryngge ⁊and chyimbe
Of wrecchednesse that passed is full yoore
Wᵗith Oolde folk save dotage is no more
¶ Whanne owre Oost hadde herd this sarmonyngge
He gan to speken as lordlye as a kyngge
Hee seyde what a mowntyht all this witte
What schall wee speke all day of holy writte
Thee devel made a Reve forto preche
Or of of a sowtere a schipman ore a leche
Seye foorht thy tale and tarie nowt thee tyme
¶ Loo here is depforde and it is halfwey pⁱrime
Loo yonder Grenewych that manye a schrewe is Inne
It were all tyme thy tale to begynne
Now syris quod this Osewold thee Reve
I prey yow alle that yee nowght yow greve
Thowgh I ansswere and svmdell sette his howue
Fore leffull it is wᵗith foors forto over schowue
¶ This drvnken Melnere hath I tolde vs here
How that bee gylid was a Carpentere
ꝐParaventure in skorne for that I am oone
And bee yowre leve I schall hym quite a noone
Ryght in his cherlis termys will I speke
I preye to god his necke mote to breke
Hee can weell in myin Eeye seene a stalke
But in his owne hee can nowght seene a balke
¶ Here be gynniht thee tale
At Trvmpyngtone nowt fer fro cantebregge
Theer gooht a broke ⁊and over it lyght a bregge
Vppon whiche brook theer stant a Melle
And this is verray sooht that I yow telle
A Mellere was dwellyngge theere manye a day
As any pocok hee prowd was and gay
¶ Pypin hee cowde ⁊and fychschen and nettys beete
And turne covppys ⁊and weell wrastele and scheete
Ay by his belte he baar a longe panade
And of a swerd well trenchaunt was thee blade
A ioly poppere baar hee in his powche
Theere was no man for ꝑperell that durste hym towche
A scheffeld Thwetell baare hee in his hose
Rownd was his face and camvsed was his nose
All peled as an ape was his skulle
Hee was a Market betere atte the fulle
Theer durste no wyght hond vppon hym legge
That hee ne swoore hee schulde anon abegge
A theef hee was was fore sothe of corn ⁊and offe Mele
And that a sley and vsawnt forto stele
His name was hoten deynovs simkyn
A wyif hee hadde comen offe noble kyn
¶ Thee ꝑpersovn offe the town here fader was
Wᵗith here hee yaf well manye a pownd of bras
Fore that symkin scholde in his blod alye
Schee was fosterid in a Nvnnerie
For symkin wolde no wyif as hee seyde
But schee were well nvrschid and a mayde
To saven his estate offe yomanrye
And schee was prowd and pert as a pye
A full feyir syghtte was it vppon hem twoo
¶ On halidayis bee fore here wolde hee goo
Wᵗith his tepet wowndēn a bowten his heede
And schee com after in a gyte of Reede
And symkin hadde hosen of thee same
Theere durste no wyght klepere here here nowt but dame
Was noon so hardy that wentte by thee wey
That wᵗith here durste onys rage ore play
But yif hee wolde bee slayn of symkin
Wᵗith panade ore wᵗith knyif ore boydekyn
For Ielous folk been ꝑperilus evere moo
Algate they wolde here wyvis wenden soo
And also fore schee was svmdell smot̉erelych
Schee was as deygne as water in a dych
As full offe hoker and of bisemare
Here thowghtte that a lady scholde here spare
What fore here kenrede and fore here nortorye
